column2: UNK5 (controls something in client tooltip related to creature faction)
DEAD_INTERACT (has something to do with unit interaction / quest status requests)
MOUNTED_COMBAT (related to possibility to cast spells while mounted)
UNK20 (may be has something to do with missiles)
UNK21 (used by client, may be related to rendering)
SQUIRE (Related to banner/backpack of creature/companion, used in CanInteract function by client)
PARTY_MEMBER (Creature can be targeted by spells that require target to be in caster's party/raid)
UNK27 (may be related to creature assistance)
